author: iarspider
body:
#### PR description:

See https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/9288.

* Move definition of `LHERunInfo::Process` comparision operators before usage [link](https://cmssdt.cern.ch/SDT/jenkins-artifacts/pull-request-integration/PR-c0e2b3/40307/build-logs/GeneratorInterface/LHEInterface/log.html)
* Add include of Track.h to make class fully defined [link](https://cmssdt.cern.ch/SDT/jenkins-artifacts/pull-request-integration/PR-c0e2b3/40307/build-logs/RecoTracker/FinalTrackSelectors/log.html)

#### PR validation:

Bot tests
title: Fixes for CLANG_X+CPP20
